resources.string:
CACertMAnager 0.0.1
Developed by the Guardian Project
https://guardianproject.info
GPL v3 Licensed 2011

!THIS APP REQUIRES ROOT!

This app allows you to browser, backup, restore and delete entries from your system's Certificate Authority keystore.

Tap a certificate to view more data.

Long press to delete, then use Menu->Save to make it permanent.

If you are having trouble saving, try the app 'Root Explorer' and use that to mount your /system into Read-Write mode
"Success! The certificate has been removed from the keystore! Now you must 'Save' to make it permanent."
Enter a cert alias to delete
Error: The keystore was not saved.
Success! System CACert keystore backed up to:
Are you sure you want to delete this certificate?
